items.sentence: Eventually, someone is going to have to tell Tom that he needs to behave himself.
Tom didn\'t think it would be appropriate for John to give Mary a pearl necklace.
Tom is going to go to prison for a crime he didn\'t commit if you don\'t confess.
It\'s OK with me if we barbecue, but I don\'t like it when smoke gets in my eyes.
It\'s only when I can\'t sleep at night that the ticking of the clock bothers me.
